case.title: TRAVEL COMPANION - 35 (LONDON)
case.text: Single white BBW looking for a single, genuine, friendly male who needs someone to accompany him on holiday. I'm available on august. Only genuine replies as so is my post. Let me know what your plan is, where you'd like to go, when and a bit about yourself and what would you expect in exchange, pic would be great too. Look forward to your reply.
